abstract: Edward Kelly, the firm’s head of global banking, will take over as chief financial officer, replacing Gary Crittenden, who will take the new post of chairman of Citi Holdings.
snippet: Edward Kelly, the firm’s head of global banking, will take over as chief financial officer, replacing Gary Crittenden, who will take the new post of chairman of Citi Holdings.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup announced another senior management shake-up Friday, raising fresh concerns about the company’s leadership just as Vikram S. Pandit appeared to have made progress stabilizing the bank.

headline.main: At Citigroup, a Shake-Up in Management Again
headline.print_headline: At Citigroup, a Shake-Up In Management Again
